attributes.action: Ban commercial vehicles from parking in residential areas at night
attributes.additional_details: Commercial vehicles have their place but not in our residential areas where they block access, cause visual  obstruction and present a real danger to other road users especially children and other pedestrians, they also cause access problems for Emergency Vehicles, they should not be allowed to be parked up in residential areas even if the driver lives on that road, also residential area roads were not made or designed for them. Support this petition in the name of road safety
